title: Read (Method)
text:
METHOD Read :
EAlarmStorageReaderErrors
Reads data from the alarm storage.

rows.Name: Read
rows.Comment: A EAlarmStorageReaderErrors value indicating, whether the processing has been completed successfully or not:EAlarmStorageReaderErrors.NoError: Completed successfullyEAlarmStorageReaderErrors.WrongParameter: If the IAlarmStorageReaderConsumer instance is invalidEAlarmStorageReaderErrors.AdditionalReadCallRequired: Reading has been completed successfully, but there isadditional call of method ContinueReading necessary to read the rest of the data

rows.Name: liTimstampFrom
rows.Comment:
The timestamp (when the alarm became active) of the 1st
alarm

rows: The timestamp of the last alarm

If this parameter is TRUE, then the rows will be returned by âtimestamp activeâ ascending,
otherwise descending

An instance of IAlarmStorageReaderConsumer, to which the data read from
the alarm storage will be passed.
